Yeast Genome Annotation and Manipulation Software

Overview

This is a documentation stub for the "Annotation" set of tools for managing and working with yeast genomes. The software is geared towards working with multiple closely related yeast species in a strong orthology framework. The software makes extensive use of synteny, the YGOB database and works best for more complete genomes.

Sections

  • Model design
  • Unique methods
  • Ancestral gene order assumptions
  • Pure Perl (almost)

Known issues and opportunities for improvement

  • Refactoring needed for Hit objects
  • Documentation
